website_summaries.verdict: A rugged nylon pool brush that is effective on all types of swimming pools.
pros: The bristles effectively remove even stubborn stains and are quite durable if proper care is taken when storing the brush between uses
The corners are curved and rounded so there are no sharp edges that might damage fiberglass or vinyl pools
cons: The pin that secures the brush to the pole does not provide a good fit with some poles

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Don't use it too much as I do have a pool cleaner service but I did use it on occasion and it worked ok-------until the last time I tried to use it. The white bristles were all over the water. It's losing so many bristles they're all over the top of the water. It's useless now and going in the garbage. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Markowski

customer_reviews.title: Bristles come out after about 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: This should last for years, yet after 6 months the bristles come out by the hundreds in my pool. Literally fell apart. And was stored in the shade. Swimline won't stand behind their products. The hide behind the one year warranty clause and won't step up and take care of the customer. Will never buy Swimline again.
customer_reviews.author: seadoon1

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges can cut liners
customer_reviews.text: I made a big mistake buying this. The edges are sharp. Sharp enough that I was just brushing my pool and it cut my liner open. I have a 36,000 gallon inground pool draining out now because of this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Afterbyrner

customer_reviews.title: Great stiff brush, way cheaper than your local store
customer_reviews.text: This not just as good as, it is the same one you will find in the stores for twice the price. Nice stiff brush great for cleaning the side of your pool. You may need a more flexible one for the tight curvy edges, but that one will be less good on the walls. My last one lasted three years in Tucson AZ heat - that is good, so I just got a new one.
customer_reviews.author: P. Tato

customer_reviews.title: Brush is JUNK.  DO NOT BUY.  In 4 months Brush falling apart in pool
customer_reviews.text: The brush is complete junk. My original brush is 15 years old and the plastic brush is not falling apart. This junk I bought on amazon is completely falling apart in my pool in 4 months of usage. Now I have a big mess because the small plastic brush pieces are everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: WVUTampaAlum

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality!
customer_reviews.text: I only used this for 1 season (3 or 4 times) and all the bristles are falling off! Now I have a ton of bristles floating around in my pool.
customer_reviews.author: No.1Key

customer_reviews.title: Bristles shed too soon
customer_reviews.text: Bristles started shedding after two years and have now come off completely after 2 1/2 years. This pool brush is junk!
customer_reviews.author: JJB.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: We bought this brush to use for scrubbing our above ground pool sides and bottom. (I bought a pole from Wal-Mart; much less expensive than any I could find on here.) It does the job. I've read reviews that said other people had issues with it. We have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but odd connector
customer_reviews.text: I struggled a bit with this rating, but can't choose a 3.5. This brush has actually performed well, and has outlasted many other brushes I've purchased on Amazon. The bristles are long lasting, and the size of the sweep area is very nice compared to the smaller head sizes - it makes sweeping so much more effective. The only issue is the connector, which is a little bit weak. It holds into the pole slightly less solid than I'd prefer, but it's never come off during any sweeping. Read my stars as 3.5, slightly enhanced because it's stood the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. House

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than standard Entex pool products.
customer_reviews.text: You must but the pole that fits. It does not fit the net pole that comes with the Entex pools. The Entex standard pole and this brush are the same diameter. It is more sturdy for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Wes B.

customer_reviews.title: Bristles fall out!! Yikes!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great first year but beginning of second year all the bristles started falling out. Can't use anymore because when I brush the pool liner the bottom is littered with bristles.
customer_reviews.author: DrA

customer_reviews.title: Too many bristles falling out.
customer_reviews.text: This works as far as brushing your pool. I've had it for a while but it is just really a chore to use. The bristles have been deteriorating since the first use. As time goes on it seems there are more and more bristles floating on the water. I'm looking for a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet.
customer_reviews.text: The brush is just ok. The bristles are not holding up as well as I had hoped and the set screws rusted very quickly. Time will tell if this was a good value or not.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Rigg

customer_reviews.title: Loses Bristles
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of months it started losing the bristles really bad. I don’t recommend it at all.
customer_reviews.author: SNOlsen

customer_reviews.title: are in fine shape and securely fastened to the blue frame
customer_reviews.text: The aluminum bracket broke after 1 year of use. Hoped it would last longer. The bristles, on the other hand, are in fine shape and securely fastened to the blue frame. I've stored this in a pool box (i.e. out of the suns UV rays).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pellegrin

customer_reviews.title: Strong Brush
customer_reviews.text: Great brush that has firm bristles for hard scrubbing. Bristles have not fallen out so far. Have used the brush for 3 years at time of this review. Fits my standard size pool pole.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that would make this brush better is if it brushed the pool by itself!
customer_reviews.author: KMart

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small pool and used this brush weekly. After 6 months the bristles started falling out. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and intact. Used it for the first time yesterday and worked as expected - that is perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl W.

customer_reviews.title: Great  Price and free delivery with Prime
customer_reviews.text: This is as good as anything you can buy in local big box store. The price and delivery make it a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Luckydog1

customer_reviews.title: It's a brush
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new one b/c the bristles were falling out of my old one. This does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: Good brush for cleaning the pool. Nice and sturdy, gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: bargaining_brunette

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great brush for 7.99 but now it looks like they raised the price
customer_reviews.author: VolFan

customer_reviews.title: Works well and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Really works well and adapted easily to my old pole. The curved edges got in the creases of my above ground pool.
customer_reviews.author: D Brower

customer_reviews.title: fail after 12 month
customer_reviews.text: fail after 12 month loss all the brushes all over the pool !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Just like any brush I have purchased at the pool store. Hope it holds up to the chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Mikkel Isen

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Brush fit well, cleans great and saved money buying from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pando

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, as intended
customer_reviews.text: Works as as I had hoped, removing algae from pool wall. May need to run through a couple times in some areas.
customer_reviews.author: Lianna

customer_reviews.title: So so product
customer_reviews.text: Works, but not particularly well made. Decent value for the price paid. Will pay more for higher quality next time.
customer_reviews.author: R. Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Bristles fell off after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: Well-made with a strong aluminum backbone, but with brittle bristles that snap off after only three months of use. This is the second Hydro Tools brush that has done this, so we are trying another brand (Splash pools brush). We'll see how that works, but the nylon bristles to ANY of these pool brushes are their weakest link...
customer_reviews.author: C. W. Sayre

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a basic pool brush
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this product for a few weeks now but it seems to be holding up well. It does it’s job of brushing the pool and seems to be an excellent value for the money. My 10-year-old grandson enjoys using it!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Ann Manjarres

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It arrived quickly and is easy to use. The brush effectively removes dirt from the side of our pool.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Mack

customer_reviews.title: The Only Brush For Me
customer_reviews.text: When we first moved into this house, the pool came with one of these aluminum brushes that always worked great. Eventually I wore it out and couldn't find another aluminum one. I've gone through the all-plastic models in various styles and features and they are all garbage. I finally found this on Amazon and felt so relieved. Now I'm back in action.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Wish it could brush the pool without my pushing the handle😊
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but is junk.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this brush much. But the last time I did, the bristles started falling out into my pool. Junk, don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: A Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value - about half or even less than from pool store or even other BB retailers
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Cheap, bristles fall out too early
customer_reviews.text: The bristles began to fall out after two uses in the pool, which was a bitch to remove from the pool. I went to Lowes and bought a cleaner for the same price and I'm currently using to clean my pool.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Brodock

customer_reviews.title: Good brush, meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: Great low cost replacement. I expect to use this no more than a year and then recycle it.
customer_reviews.author: JQP

customer_reviews.title: Works great, just thought it was a little bigger based on the pic
customer_reviews.text: Works great....I just thought it was bigger than it was. I must have had a 24" before so the pic looked a little deceiving but that was prolly my fault for not reading the details close enough. This is 16.5" just so you know. Still does the job.
customer_reviews.author: jazzyj

customer_reviews.title: Just good for some months
customer_reviews.text: Good food some months, brush hairs started to fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Belen Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, not the worst
customer_reviews.text: Like every reviewer has said, the pin does not does it job well. I had to change it to my spare ones so that the brush will stay onto the pole. The clip that came on the brush tends to let the brush slip off the pole whenever heavy scrubbing is performed. Other than that it does its job. For the price, I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L

customer_reviews.title: 1 YEAR WONDER THEN GOES BALD
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 1 year of light use before bristles started falling out. Used on a figerglas pool.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R.

customer_reviews.title: Bristles fall out.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap enough and worked fine. Lasted 1 year before bristles were falling out everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: powersch

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice stiff brush, would buy again. No idea how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: SenatorSteak

customer_reviews.title: Here's to clean pools!
customer_reviews.text: Working great in my intex pool. I have to use by hand right now, I didn't realize it required a separate extension boom from my intex brand skimmer. Oversight on my part. Seems to be robust!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Decent price & quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Good product. Will buy more from in future.
customer_reviews.author: sagman49

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Using this product on a above ground pool. Upon receipt , noticed that the brush is of good quality and should last a while.
customer_reviews.author: freddy diaz

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I got 4 years out of my old one. So they hold up well
customer_reviews.author: john derry

customer_reviews.title: Good brush.
customer_reviews.text: So far this brush works great. Gets the pool walls clean and is not losing bristles like so many others before. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. If your brush is falling apart try storing ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Works fine. If your brush is falling apart try storing it out of the sunlight. UV kills these things, not pool water. My last one lasted several years and I expect the same out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lane

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: What can go wrong with a pool brush? Glad you asked. The plastic tension piece in the brush that is supposed to hold it in the pole is not nearly strong enough to hold it in place. One twist or bump while brushing and you may see your brush drop to the bottom of your pool!!
customer_reviews.author: John W. Kovacs

customer_reviews.title: I have had better luck with this brush than some others
customer_reviews.text: I have had better luck with this brush than some others. Do not have nearly as much problem with the bristles coming off. We'll see after another hot Texas summer.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Seems better made than the ones I get at local pool supply. Price was certainly better. Usually my pool brushes last just a matter of a few months. I'll update how it holds up. But, as of now, I would certainly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: OTsMom

customer_reviews.title: great brush if you rinse and keep out of sun!
customer_reviews.text: After years owning pools, finally I discovered: Store pool equipment away from sun! After years of pool cleaning I finally got it...bristles would fall out and clog up my skimmer and filter and metal corroded! that was because I left the brush out in the Sun and did not rinse chlorine out of it. So now that I rinse the brush with clean water and store out of sunlight the brush lasts much longer and there are no bristles breaking off and clogging pool equipment! not to mention not having to replace your brush all the time! brushes are not Cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Darling

customer_reviews.title: Great brush at a great price,
customer_reviews.text: This brush feels lighter than the old one, but somehow feels more sturdy. The light weight makes it easier to work with. So far, I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Sly

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: Great brush (no bristles falling out) but it didn't fit my (already-owned) pole (it's probably just a non-standard pole).
customer_reviews.author: NIS350ZTT

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect if I brush at an angle.
customer_reviews.text: Used it 3 times so far. Works great if I brush from an angle. If I use it to go straight down the jumps jumps against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: nice pool brush
customer_reviews.text: Nice pool brush. Has aluminum backer and is screwed to the plastic brush. Plastic clip will get brittle and break over time. Good size for medium size pools.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Holmberg

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit standard pool pole
customer_reviews.text: This brush is OK, but it doesn't fit a standard pool pole. The attachment piece is too narrow and constantly fell off in the bottom of the pool until I replaced the plastic push pins with a nut and bolt.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality full aluminum brush at a price you can't beat. I do wish the bristles were slightly softer, but it works well
customer_reviews.author: cody saarloos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good brush... Have had 3 , brush doesn't come out in pool after aging... Just wears out..
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Looked great, but then .....
customer_reviews.text: This looked great when I bought, within month all the bristles start to deteriorate in the pool. Terrible product even for the low price, I will avoid in future.
customer_reviews.author: fotb

customer_reviews.title: Better options out there
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, but it broke where the screws attach to brush through regular use
customer_reviews.author: RyanMJohnson75

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit my handle
customer_reviews.text: Although this brush looks like the one I had, the plastic parts that go into the handle don't go in far enough to hold on so it's a pain to use. It keeps coming lose.
customer_reviews.author: mrscott

customer_reviews.title: Had a large brush for our pool and wanted something ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a large brush for our pool and wanted something smaller to push through the water. Works well and much easier to use than my old brush.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Great product for daily cleaning use
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend anyone looking for a Pool Brush this is great for the price and gives me good 1 year of life. I would repeat this order for my next swimming season.

customer_reviews.title: cheap pool brush
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace one that was old as the bristles were coming off. It's a cheap pool brush that'll last a few years and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: OSFANs

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to go to the computer and order this brush. There was no running around looking for it. It is great quality, and we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: KDB

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected. Has been rinsed after each use ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Has been rinsed after each use and have no troubles with losing brush bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Mustang0913

customer_reviews.title: Good Broom
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy bristles.. only problem is my pool is salt water and the top is rusting.. but glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Clip does not hold
customer_reviews.text: The plastic clip on this brush does not catch well enough to stay put. Unless you want to deep dive for this thing every time you use it. Don't buy it. It is too poorly made to be of value for a owner of a inground pool.
customer_reviews.author: Dubb

customer_reviews.title: good and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprise. It is professional quality. I see it lasting a long time. It does a great job scrubbing down the floor and sides of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: a good brush just like the one it replaces
customer_reviews.text: Yep, a good brush just like the one it replaces, which broke apart after only ten years of tough duty. I mean, how much extra can one ask of cast aluminum?
customer_reviews.author: J. McSherry

customer_reviews.title: great for my pool -- does the job well -- ...
customer_reviews.text: great for my pool -- does the job well -- will last because of the AL material -- no rusting
customer_reviews.author: Steven Leung

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This pool brush fit my aluminum pole handle perfectly and works very well for brushing my pool areas. The brush seems to be well made and a heavy duty construction.
customer_reviews.author: B. Breckenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Great product, exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, exceeds expectations. Outperformed store bought product that would not keep algae in check.
customer_reviews.author: JRB

customer_reviews.title: Pool brush
customer_reviews.text: The price was right for a great utility tool and pool supply places are typically overpriced. Here is where you get your pool supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sanley

customer_reviews.title: Clean Pool!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why I've been buying these from the expensive pool stores locally. Same quality here at a much cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: eh nothing special
customer_reviews.text: the brissles are a little wimpy, clear, doubt they will stand up to the suns uv well. just ok. metal looks a little rough after a few months of use.

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: This is the same pool wall brush you'd buy at most Pool Supply Companies,@ 1/2 the price. Good Value for the money.

customer_reviews.text: The tool is great for brushing the pool. The best feature is the aluminum ectension it is muc sturdier than a plastic extension.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about a year and then the bristles started falling out.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made, bristles seem good and not loosing a lot of them, cleans nicely.

customer_reviews.title: Sassy
customer_reviews.text: Hydro Tools 8220 18-inch aluminum pool floor and wall brush was purchased to help clean our pool! Very good price for the product!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: pool brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pool brush at a good price. Usually my pool brushes last two or three seasons, so I'll probably buy the same brand when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: R. Scott

customer_reviews.title: happy
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy. It came the next day and it was nicer than expected. I tried it out as soon as I got it. My kids saw me using it and said I looked like I was having fun...so I showed them how to use it so every time I start using it they take over.
customer_reviews.author: summer

customer_reviews.title: Brush
customer_reviews.text: It brushes... What can I say? If I had someone else to push it, it would be better. It is good.
customer_reviews.author: B. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the cheap all plastic ones you can purchase at the local pool store, this is metal reinforced throughout.
customer_reviews.author: Scott and Linda R.

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to store bought
customer_reviews.text: Similar in price and quality to what I could find in local poolstore. Only drawback was the butterfly clip to attach it to the pole was not of good quality so it kept slipping off. I exchanged the clip with the old brush and now does not fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Jedi Beeds

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: After about 8 months the bristles are coming off in the pool while scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn M Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Complete and utter junk
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks of use, the bristles started to come off when brushing the pool. And these little bristles are impossible to fish out of the water. I've used inexpensive brushes for years and never had that happen. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: GREAT so far
customer_reviews.text: GREAT so far. Will update to 5 starts if it is still great next season. Have bought others before that seem fine but only last a season.
customer_reviews.author: Lexydoll

customer_reviews.title: Don't  buy this brush
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst pool brushes I've bought. After a few months of use the bristles will break off into your pool. You get what you pay for!!!
customer_reviews.author: Da Captain

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Good and stiff brush. Great for the price. I would have given it 5 stars but it is already starting to show wear when using the angled sides. But this is expected with the plastic bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing SUCKS !!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this brush in February and i clean my pool once a week... well all the bristles are now gone... and it is time to buy a new again... .worst quality ever... do not buy it
customer_reviews.author: ismel camacho

customer_reviews.title: I appreciate the quality and durability of this pool brush.
customer_reviews.text: I am quite impressed and I appreciate the quality and durability of this pool brush. I can very well tell it will last for many years and has done a wonderful job on my pool. If you found this review helpful, please let me know by clicking yes underneath my review. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: POOL BRUSH
customer_reviews.text: ARRIVED PROMPTLY, STURDY CONSTRUCTION. GOOD PRICE CHEAPER THAN MY LOCAL HOME DEPOT AND LOTS AND LOTS CHEAPER THAN THE LOCAL POOL STORES. ASK ME IN A FEW YEARS YEARS IF IT IS AS DURABLE.
customer_reviews.author: THINGS THAT MAKE YOU GO HMMMMM.

product_meta.title: HydroTools by Swimline Aluminum Pool Floor & Wall Brush
product_meta.description:
Swimline is a family owned and operated business founded in 1971 and is the leading manufacturer of high quality pool products. At its inception, Swimline was the largest manufacturer of in-ground and above-ground pool liners, covers, and all related accessories. In 1990, Swimline founded International Leisure Products, which expanded the product line to pool toys, games, fun floats and accessories. With this vast array of pool products, Swimline continued to deliver on the needs of its reputable business partners to provide quality products. Four years later, in 1994, Swimline acquired United Leisure Industries HydroTools , which allowed the company to manufacture traditional pool accessories such as leaf skimmers, pool filters, and a wide range of maintenance equipment to keep pools in top shape. HydroTools furthers our commitment to supplying quality products to the pool trade.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Reinforced aluminum construction with nylon bristles. Curved design.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars610 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
